DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety acetaminophen aspirin versus placebo acute treatment migraine
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Acetaminophen Aspirin Versus Placebo Acute Treatment Migraine
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Male female age 18 year . 2. International Headache Society ( IHS ) diagnosis migraine without aura typical aura migraine headache . 3 . History experience least 1 , 8 , acute migraine attack monthly previous year . 4 . History least moderate migraine pain intensity , leave untreated . 5 . History frequently always experience nausea migraine attack . Exclusion criterion : Subjects eligible inclusion study must fulfill follow criterion : 1 . Headache symptom may due aggravate : Recent ( within 6 month ) head neck trauma ( e.g. , whiplash ) Head neck pain secondary orthopedic abnormality Cluster headache Specific migraine variant ( e.g. , basilartype artery migraine , opthalmoplegic migraine , hemiplegic migraine , migraine aura without headache ) Other serious , nonmigraine cause headache ( e.g. , increased intracranial pressure , intracranial bleeding , meningitis , malignancy ) Nonserious , nonmigraine cause headache ( e.g. , cold , flu , hangover ) 2 . History vomit 20 % migraine attack . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
